items.textToSpeech: You've worked hard to build a solid financial footing, but accidents can ruin things.
I know you've worked hard to build a solid financial footing, but nothing is safe from accidents and disasters.

messages.textToSpeech: Insurance helps you to protect your life, your ability to earn income, and to keep a roof over your head
